statements: SELECT * FROM books;
SELECT title, author, publish_date FROM books ORDER BY publish_date ASC;
SELECT title, author, publish_date FROM books WHERE category='Science Fiction';
SELECT title, author FROM books WHERE author LIKE '%Rowling%';
SELECT title, author, tags FROM books WHERE tags @> ARRAY['Classic'] ORDER BY author DESC;
SELECT * FROM books WHERE category = 'Fiction';
SELECT title, author, publish_date FROM books WHERE publish_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT title, author FROM books WHERE tags @> ARRAY['thriller']::VARCHAR[];
SELECT title, author, description FROM books WHERE author = 'Emily Dickinson' AND (category = 'Poetry' OR category = 'Literature');
SELECT title, author, category FROM books WHERE description ILIKE '%murder%' AND publish_date BETWEEN '2015-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';
SELECT * FROM books ORDER BY book_title DESC, author ASC;
SELECT book_title, author FROM books WHERE publish_year > 2000;
SELECT book_title, author, publish_year FROM books WHERE author LIKE '%Rowling%';
SELECT book_title, publish_year FROM books WHERE category_id = 2 ORDER BY publish_year DESC;
SELECT book_title, author FROM books WHERE book_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT book_title, author, publish_year FROM books WHERE category_id = 1 ORDER BY publish_year DESC, book_title ASC;
SELECT * FROM books WHERE publish_year BETWEEN 2000 AND 2010 ORDER BY book_title ASC;
SELECT book_title, author FROM books WHERE author LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY book_title ASC;
SELECT book_title, publish_year FROM books WHERE publish_year > 2000 AND category_id = 2 ORDER BY publish_year DESC;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(book_id) FROM categories c JOIN books b ON c.category_id = b.category_id GROUP BY category_name ORDER BY COUNT(book_id) DESC;
SELECT * FROM Categories;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM Categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT book_title, author_name, publication_year FROM Books WHERE publication_year > 2000;
SELECT book_title, author_name, category_name FROM Books JOIN Categories ON Books.category_id = Categories.category_id;
SELECT * FROM Tags WHERE tag_name LIKE 'fiction%';
SELECT * FROM Books ORDER BY book_title ASC, publication_year DESC;
SELECT book_title, author_name FROM Books WHERE publication_year > 2000 AND category_id = 3;
SELECT DISTINCT category_id FROM Books WHERE publication_year BETWEEN 2000 AND 2020 ORDER BY category_id DESC;
SELECT book_title, JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(tags_array) AS tag_count FROM Books WHERE JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(tags_array) > 3 ORDER BY tag_count DESC, book_title ASC;

SELECT book_title, publication_year, c.category_name FROM Books b INNER JOIN Categories c ON b.category_id = c.category_id WHERE b.publication_year < 2000 ORDER BY c.category_name ASC, book_title DESC;
SELECT * FROM tags ORDER BY tag_id DESC;
SELECT tag_name FROM tags WHERE tag_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM tags WHERE tag_name LIKE 't%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS tag_count FROM tags;
SELECT * FROM tags ORDER BY tag_name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT tag_name FROM tags WHERE tag_id = '123'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tags WHERE tag_id = '456' AND tag_name LIKE '%example%'
SELECT DISTINCT tag_name FROM tags ORDER BY tag_id ASC
SELECT tag_id, tag_name FROM tags WHERE tag_name IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM books;
SELECT title, author FROM books WHERE genre='Fantasy';
SELECT title, author, genre FROM books ORDER BY author ASC;
SELECT book_id, title, genre FROM books WHERE author='J.K. Rowling' AND genre='Fantasy';
SELECT book_id, title FROM books WHERE genre='Mystery' OR genre='Thriller' ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT * FROM books;
SELECT title, author, genre FROM books WHERE genre = 'Fiction';
SELECT title, author FROM books ORDER BY author DESC;
SELECT title, author, category_name FROM books JOIN book_categories ON books.book_id = book_categories.book_id JOIN categories ON book_categories.category_id = categories.category_id;
SELECT title, tag_name FROM books JOIN book_tags ON books.book_id = book_tags.book_id JOIN tags ON book_tags.tag_id = tags.tag_id WHERE tags.tag_name = 'Fantasy';
